entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found a clue on Soris. Now, it's time to find the man who sent Soris after Nalskel; Charde the rival politician.
entries.journal_entry_description: According to Nalskel, an up and coming politician of Wayfar, a bounty hunter named Soris has been tracking him for days. Luckily for Nalskel, Soris is a very sloppy bounty hunter. Find him and defeat him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Nalskel has heard of you. Many rumors are flying around that you're a bounty hunter who does a good job and who doesn't ask questions. He wants you to find a bounty hunter named Soris who has been tracking Nalskel for days. So far, Soris been unsuccessful in killing the politician.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Nalskel's associates have tracked Soris down. Appearantly, Soris is on a mission. If he's not at his camp, find a clue that might tell you where he might have gone.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Soris wasn't at his camp. The clue you found there suggests he can found in this area. Defeat him and find out who sent Soris after Nalskel.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Nalskel wants you to find the man who sent Soris. Nalskel says it's his rival, Charde; the politician who is running against him.
